alert.note: Alert for Finney; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 9:06PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Finney, southeastern Scott and southern Lane Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 905 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amy, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dighton around 915 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Alamota. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southwestern and west central Kansas.
